mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment ( comment_content, comment_step, comment_group, commendt_create_dt, comment_update_dt, board_id, user_key ) VALUES ( #{commentContent}, #{commentStep}, #{commentGroup}, NOW(), NOW(), #{boardId}, #{userKey} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_nickname, c.comment_create_dt, c.comment_content, c.comment_id, c.comment_step, u.user_profile_picture_generated FROM board_comment c JOIN users u ON c.user_key = u.user_key WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY c.comment_group, c.comment_step
